Jump to navigation Jump to search
Raion in Ternopil Oblast, Ukraine
Husiatyn Raion

Гусятинський район

The Husiatyn Raion ( Ukrainian : Гусятинський район ) is a former raion in Ternopil Oblast in western Ukraine . Its administrative center is Husiatyn . It has a population of 66 803.
